attributes.action: Create a Voluntary M.O.T uk citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is where British citizens if they so wish can go to have a full check over like a M.O.T on a car. Full checks are made on cars every year to make sure they are in working order yet we do not have the same safety checks to our selves. Having a full check-up and scanning for various things such as heart defects, cancer and blood disorders which a normal medical does not cover and could potentially save thousands of lives.
